channel.title: Profiles on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Profiles on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Filter
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Filter Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1156 Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Roles page title contains ‘Role’ reset filter Total of Roles after reset = Total of Roles Filter by id_Role value 4" Number of Roles < Total of Roles

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - CRUD
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - CRUD Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1157 Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Roles page title contains ‘Roles’ reset filter Total of Roles > 0 go to add new Role title contains ‘New Role’ create Role Criteria : name: faker.

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - pagination and Bulk Actions
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - pagination and Bulk Actions Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1158 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Advanced parameters > Team > Roles Role page is displayed Create 10 roles Successful creation alert is displayed Number of Roles = Total of Roles + 10 Change the items number to 10 per page The number of pages should be displayed (page 1 / 2) Click on next The page number should be displayed (page 2 / 2) Click on previous Page number should be displayed

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Sort
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Sort Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1159 Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Roles page title contains ‘Roles’ profiles list is well displayed Reset all filters All filters are reset , the Roles are displayed Sort by ID asc Roles list are sorted by ID (1-> 2 ->3 …) Sort by ID desc Roles list are sorted by ID (3-> 2 ->1…) Sort by name asc Roles list are sorted by name (a-> b ->c …) Sort by name desc Roles list are sorted by name (c-> b ->a…)

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Help card
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Help card Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1160 Steps Step Description Expected result BO > Advanced Parameters > Team > Roles Roles page is well displayed Click on Help button on top right corner Help card is displayed from the right side of the page Case1
